schools.name: Beecher City Grade School
schools.school-summary: Beecher City Grade School, a public school located in Beecher City, IL, serves grades PK-5 in the Beecher City Community Unit School District 20.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 6 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
schools.district-name: Beecher City Community Unit School District 20
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Beecher City Jr-Sr High School
schools.school-summary: Beecher City Jr-Sr High School, a public school located in Beecher City, IL, serves grades 6-12 in the Beecher City Community Unit School District 20.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 6 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
